about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn more about our company, our team, and our values.
about.description: RIKEN Vietnam is a leading company in the production and processing of sandpaper, woodworking metal equipment, and raw materials for furniture and leather factories. Our mission is to provide high-quality products and services to our customers, ensuring their satisfaction and success.
